auth.signInDescription: Sign in or create an account to continue
auth.gdprConsent: I agree that my personal data will be processed in accordance with the
auth.marketingConsent: I agree to receive marketing communications (optional)

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataControllerText: The data controller is Roomivo, a simplified joint-stock company registered in France. In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act, we are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectedText: We only collect data necessary for the operation of our service:
privacy.identificationData: Identification data: last name, first name, email
privacy.navigationData: Navigation data: connection logs, IP address
privacy.legalBasisText: The processing of your data is based on:
privacy.contractExecution: Contract execution: provision of the matching service
privacy.legalObligation: Legal obligation: compliance with French rental laws
privacy.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest: service improvement, fraud prevention
privacy.yourRightsText: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.rightOfAccess: Right of access: consult your data
privacy.rightOfRectification: Right of rectification: correct your data
privacy.rightToErasure: Right to erasure: delete your account and data
privacy.rightToPortability: Right to data portability: download your data
privacy.rightToObject: Right to object: refuse certain processing
privacy.exerciseRights: To exercise your rights, go to your profile or contact our DPO.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:
privacy.accessControl: Strict access control (RLS - Row Level Security)
privacy.transfersText: Your data is hosted in the European Union. No transfer outside the EU is made without appropriate guarantees (European Commission standard contractual clauses).
privacy.cookiesText: We only use cookies essential for the operation of the service (authentication, interface preferences). No tracking or advertising cookies are used.
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding your personal data:
privacy.cnilComplaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority):

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.purposeText: These Terms of Service (ToS) govern access to and use of the Roomivo platform, a matching service between tenants and landlords, compliant with French rental legislation.
terms.acceptanceText: Using Roomivo implies full acceptance of these ToS. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.contracts: Generation of contracts compliant with French law
terms.acceptTerms: Accepting the ToS and Privacy Policy
terms.consentGDPR: Consenting to the processing of personal data (GDPR)
terms.accountSecurity: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your credentials.
terms.respectLaw: Respect the law of July 6, 1989 on residential leases
terms.diagnostics: Respect mandatory diagnostics (DPE, lead, asbestos, etc.)
terms.complianceText: Roomivo complies with French legislation in force:
terms.rentalLaw: Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989 on rental relations
terms.alurLaw: ALUR Law (Access to Housing and Renovated Urbanism)
terms.gdprLaw: GDPR and French Data Protection Act
terms.pricingText: Service fees are clearly displayed before any transaction. In accordance with the ALUR law, agency fees are shared between tenant and landlord according to legal rates.
terms.depositText: The security deposit is capped at 1 month's rent excluding charges for unfurnished housing, and 2 months for furnished housing, in accordance with Article 22 of the law of July 6, 1989.
terms.terminationText: You can delete your account at any time from your profile. In accordance with GDPR, your data will be deleted within 30 days, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.
terms.liabilityText: Roomivo acts as an intermediary. We are not responsible for disputes between tenants and landlords, but offer a mediation service.
terms.jurisdictionText: These ToS are subject to French law. Any dispute will be brought before the competent French courts. In accordance with the European directive on online dispute resolution, you can also use the dispute resolution platform:
terms.contactLegal: For any questions regarding these ToS, contact us at: legal@roomivo.fr

cookie.title: Data Protection
cookie.description: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our platform. In accordance with GDPR and French legislation, we respect your privacy. We only store cookies necessary for authentication and interface preferences.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account information
profile.gdprDescription: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation, you have rights over your personal data
profile.dataPortabilityText: Download a complete copy of your personal data in JSON format. You will receive an email with a secure download link valid for 7 days.
profile.rightToErasure: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
profile.rightToErasureText: Permanently delete your account and all your personal data. This action is irreversible. A period of 30 days is provided before final deletion.
profile.deleteConfirmText: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days in accordance with GDPR:
profile.legalRetention: Some data may be retained for legal obligations (accounting, contracts).
profile.otherRights: To exercise your other GDPR rights (rectification, limitation, opposition), contact our DPO:
profile.cnilComplaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL:
profile.exportRequested: Export request registered. You will receive your data by email within 48 hours in accordance with GDPR.
profile.deleteRequested: Deletion request registered. Your account will be deleted within 30 days in accordance with GDPR.

footer.tagline: Transparent rental platform connecting tenants and landlords

ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your Roomivo assistant. How can I help you today?
ai.errorRate: Rate limit reached. Please try again later.
ai.errorCredits: AI credits exhausted. Please add credits.

landing.title: Roomivo
landing.tagline: The first step to settling in
landing.subtitle: Secure rental, anti-fraud, 100% compliant with French law. For tenants and landlords who want to save time.
landing.featuresSubtitle: The essentials to rent securely, without paperwork or unpleasant surprises
landing.securePaymentDesc: Your money protected until move-in. Compliant with French law (DSP2)
landing.photoInspectionDesc: Irrefutable legal proof. Both parties digitally sign the inspection
landing.idVerificationDesc: Anti-fraud protection. GDPR-compliant verification from application
landing.smartAutomationDesc: No response? No problem. Automatic actions after waiting period
landing.simpleManagementDesc: Single dashboard to manage everything. Zero paperwork, zero stress
landing.legalComplianceDesc: Law of July 6, 1989, ALUR, ELAN. All your legal documents generated automatically
landing.ctaSubtitle: Free registration. No credit card required. Landlords and tenants welcome.
landing.footerTagline: The first step to settling in

roleSelection.title: You are...
roleSelection.subtitle: Choose your profile to access tailored features
roleSelection.tenantFeature2Desc: Legal proof to recover your deposit
roleSelection.landlordDesc: Find the ideal tenant quickly and securely
roleSelection.dualRole: You can have both profiles if you are both tenant and landlord

tenantDashboard.title: Tenant Dashboard
tenantDashboard.subtitle: Manage your applications and procedures
tenantDashboard.applicationHistory: History of all your rental requests
tenantDashboard.inspectionAvailable: Inspection will be available after your application is accepted

inspection.title: Property Inspection
inspection.description: Photos required for each room. Both parties must sign.
inspection.completed: Completed and signed by both parties
inspection.otherPartyMustSign: The other party must sign to finalize the inspection.
inspection.legalCompliance: ⚖️ Compliant with the law of July 6, 1989 - Article 3 (Mandatory contradictory inventory)

rentReceipt.title: Rent Receipt
rentReceipt.subtitle: Article 21, Law 1989
rentReceipt.legalNote: ⚖️ Rent receipt is mandatory upon tenant's request (Article 21, Law of July 6, 1989). It certifies payment of rent and charges.
rentReceipt.generatedSuccess: The rent receipt has been created and is ready to download.
rentReceipt.legalCompliance: Document compliant with Article 21 of Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989

endOfLease.title: End of Lease
endOfLease.subtitle: Art. 12-15 Law 1989
endOfLease.legalNote: Legal notice period: 3 months for tenant (1 month in tense zone - Art. 12). 6 months for landlord with legitimate reason (Art. 15).
endOfLease.reducedNotice: Reduced notice (1 month - tense zone, transfer, job loss, 60+ years)
endOfLease.checkOut: Move-out inspection to be carried out
endOfLease.generatedSuccess: The end of lease document has been created successfully.
endOfLease.legalCompliance: Document compliant with Articles 12, 15 and 22 of Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989

contract.title: Rental Contract
contract.subtitle: Compliant with Law of July 6, 1989
contract.heading: RESIDENTIAL LEASE (Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989)
contract.duration1: Duration: 3 years minimum (individual landlord) - Art. 10 law 1989
contract.duration2: Automatic renewal unless notice in legal form
contract.duration3: Tenant notice: 3 months (1 month in tense zone) - Art. 12
contract.duration4: Landlord notice: 6 months for legitimate reason only - Art. 15
contract.tenantObligation2: Payment of rent and charges on the 1st of each month
contract.tenantObligation3: Current maintenance and tenant repairs - Art. 7
contract.tenantObligation4: Peaceful enjoyment of the property (good father of family)
contract.landlordObligation2: Ensure repairs other than tenant repairs - Art. 6
contract.landlordObligation4: Respect right to remain in the premises
contract.diagnostic2: Lead Exposure Risk Assessment (CREP) if before 1949
contract.diagnostic4: Gas and electrical installations if over 15 years
contract.compliance: ⚖️ Contract compliant with Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989, ALUR law, and Decree No. 87-713 establishing the list of mandatory and prohibited clauses.
contract.electronicSignatureNote: Electronic signature has the same legal value as handwritten signature (eIDAS Regulation)

maintenance.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to submit a request
maintenance.requestSuccess: Your maintenance request has been submitted successfully
maintenance.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
